description.value:
The witch causes a creature within 30 feet to die and be immediately reincarnated into a new body. A Will save negates this effect. Those that fail are slain and immediately brought back to life with the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.3w1ozzzf8hk0gdzm]{Reincarnate}.

Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.
